fields.day1_exercises:
Main Workout:
Back Squats – 4x8
Bench Press – 4x8
Bent-over Rows – 4x10
Plank with Shoulder Taps – 3x30 sec

Cardio:
15 min incline treadmill run
fields.day2_exercises:
Main Workout:
Romanian Deadlifts – 3x12
Kettlebell Swings – 3x15
Hanging Leg Raises – 3x12
Battle Ropes – 3x30 sec

HIIT:
10 rounds of 30 sec sprint + 30 sec rest
fields.day3_exercises:
Perform 3 rounds with minimal rest:
Jump Rope – 1 min
Kettlebell Goblet Squats – 12 reps
Box Jumps – 10 reps
Sled Pushes – 20m
Hanging Knee Raises – 3x12
fields.notes:
Best For: Intermediate trainees looking for efficient, well-rounded workouts.
Progressive overload with structured strength training.
Rest Between Sets: 30-60 sec (strength), minimal rest in circuits.
Focus on form and controlled movements.

fields.day1_exercises:
Main Workout:
Incline Dumbbell Press – 4x8
Pull-ups (Assisted if needed) – 4x8
Dips – 3x12

Cardio:
15 min treadmill run
fields.day2_exercises:
Main Workout:
Deadlifts – 4x6
Bulgarian Split Squats – 3x12
Plank with Weighted Reach – 3x30 sec

HIIT:
5 rounds of 40 sec row + 20 sec rest
fields.day3_exercises:
Perform 4 rounds:
Battle Ropes – 30 sec
Wall Balls – 15 reps
Jump Lunges – 12 reps
Farmer's Carry – 20m
fields.notes:
Best For: Those looking to enhance strength, endurance, and overall fitness.
Balance between strength and conditioning.
Focus on proper form and progression.
Ensure adequate recovery between sessions.

fields.day1_exercises:
Main Workout:
Barbell Bench Press – 4x8
Overhead Dumbbell Press – 3x10
Triceps Dips – 3x12

Cardio:
10 min sprint intervals
fields.day2_exercises:
Main Workout:
Deadlifts – 4x6
Lat Pulldowns – 4x8
Face Pulls – 3x12

Cardio:
15 min rowing
fields.day3_exercises:
Front Squats – 4x8
Romanian Deadlifts – 3x12
Glute Bridges – 3x15
Plank Hold – 3x40 sec
fields.day4_exercises:
Perform 4 rounds:
Box Jumps – 12 reps
Kettlebell Swings – 15 reps
Sled Push – 20m
Rowing Machine – 1 min
fields.day5_exercises:
Hanging Leg Raises – 3x12
Russian Twists – 3x20
30 min incline walking / cycling
fields.notes:
Best For: Intermediate athletes looking for a structured weekly progression.
Balance between strength, cardio, and recovery.
Focus on progressive overload.
Maintain proper form throughout.

fields.day1_exercises:
Barbell Squats – 5x6
Overhead Press – 4x8
Romanian Deadlifts – 3x12
fields.day2_exercises:
Main Workout:
Weighted Step-ups – 3x12
Chin-ups – 4x10
Plank with Shoulder Taps – 3x30 sec

Cardio:
15 min incline walking
fields.day3_exercises:
Sprint Intervals (30 sec on, 30 sec off) x10
Battle Ropes – 30 sec x3
Farmer's Carry – 3x20m
fields.day4_exercises:
Front Squats – 4x8
Deadlifts – 4x6
Bulgarian Split Squats – 3x12
fields.day5_exercises:
Jump Rope – 1 min
Wall Balls – 15 reps
Kettlebell Swings – 12 reps
fields.day6_exercises:
Yoga / Swimming / Cycling (30 min)
Core Circuits (Planks, Leg Raises, Russian Twists)
fields.notes:
Best For: Those who can handle higher training volume while balancing recovery.
Focus on performance and conditioning.
Ensure proper recovery between sessions.
Maintain proper form despite increased volume.
